TILES_DEFAULT_SIZE - Static variable in class main.Game
How tall and wide each tile is (they should be squares) in pixels
TILES_IN_HEIGHT - Static variable in class main.Game
This is the amount of tiles tall the game is, how many tiles should be drawn vertically
TILES_IN_WIDTH - Static variable in class main.Game
This is the amount of tiles wide the game is, how many tiles should be drawn horizontally

The size of the tiles scaled with the Game
